Package index

Phylepic charts

phylepic()
Combine metadata (a line list) with a phylogenetic tree
plot(<phylepic>) autoplot(<phylepic>)
Plot "phylepic" objects
plot_bars()
Plot metadata bars panel
plot_calendar()
Plot calendar panel
plot_epicurve()
Plot epidemic curve panel
plot_tree()
Plot phylogenetic tree panel

Calendar drawing

geom_calendar()
Specialised rectangular geometry for calendar plots
stat_bin_location()
Annotate rows with 2D bin positions
oob_infinite()
Out of bounds handling

Week binning

scale_x_week()
Date scale with breaks specified by week
week_breaks()
Breaks for week-binning date axes

Automatic binning

stat_bin_auto()
Calculate bins using scale breaks
stat_bin_2d_auto()
Calculate two-dimensional bins using scale breaks
breaks_cached()
Cached scale break function

Phylogenetic tree drawing

coord_tree()
Cartesian coordinates with specialised grid for trees
create_tree_layout()
Create a graph layout for plotting
geom_node_text_filled()
Annotate nodes with text and a background
drop.clade()
Drop a clade from a phylogentic tree
